data.name: The Ecdysis
data.detailed_description:
THE ECDYSIS is a single player – third person episodic game that allows the player to live the life of Robin.jr, a professional photographer and takes you through the adventures and mysteries that he encounters on his journey.

Play as Robin.jr, a professional photographer who embarks on a journey to his dream place to experience and capture the nature and wildlife
but you know... not everything works as planned. As a number of mysterious events occur, robin has to investigate and find out what's happening around him.

THRILLING STORYLINE

Experience a modern thrilling storyline and try to connect dots as much as you could

CINEMATIC VISUALS

A cinematic experience throughout the game with appealing visuals

GO FOR A LONG DRIVE

Fire up your truck for a long journey to Mt. Mare's Nest

INTERACT WITH ENVIRONMENT

Each and every object around has it's story. Interact with objects around the place

INTRIGUING GAMEPLAY

A short episodic game with light puzzle solving, exploring and pathfinding

ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK

Distinct original soundtrack and background score by Kingsley Roy [independent musician]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above (64-bit Operating System)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA MX250 or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or intel UHD or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NOTE : these requirements are for demo version, full game's requirement may or may not change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above (64-bit Operating System)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB or AMD Radeon R9 280X 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: NOTE : these requirements are for demo version, full game's requirement may or may not change
